trans-unit.source: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供大量转换函数，并公开 GDI + <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了大量的转换函数，并公开 GDI +<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当呈现为可缩放向量图形 (SVG)，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象自定义绘制将不能 SVG 文档的一部分包括。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note also that, by default, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> functions usually take absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，默认情况下，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>函数通常采用绝对坐标。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此类的转换方法应执行绘制操作的情况下很有用。

trans-unit.source: A ChartGraphics object is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: 在中公开 ChartGraphics 对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs>类？ qualifyHint = False & 自动升级 = True，可以轻松地进行的自定义绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 重大更改以及供的默认行为<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，可能不稳定绘制图表图像和其关联的元素。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, positioning may be altered.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以更改定位。

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议，你会变得很好地熟悉 GDI + 之前对的属性进行任何重大更改<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放非托管，并 （可选） 托管资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>释放非托管及托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 采用<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>对象，并将其相对坐标转换为绝对坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>以相对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>以绝对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 采用<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>对象，并将其相对坐标转换为绝对坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>以相对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>以绝对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 采用<xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>使用相对坐标和返回的对象<xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>使用绝对坐标的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>以相对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>以绝对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: Takes a given axis value for a specified axis and returns the relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: 采用指定轴的给定的轴值并返回相对像素值。

trans-unit.source: Chart area name.
trans-unit.target: 图表区名称。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"></xref> enumeration value that identifies the relevant axis.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"> </xref>枚举值，该值标识相关的轴。

trans-unit.source: The axis value to be converted to a relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为相对像素值的轴值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the converted axis value, in relative pixel coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示转换后的轴值，以相对像素坐标。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 采用<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>使用绝对坐标和返回的对象<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>使用相对坐标的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>以绝对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>以相对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that is using absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 采用<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>绝对坐标和返回使用的结构<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>使用相对坐标的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>以绝对坐标表示的结构。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>相对坐标中的结构。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 采用<xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>对象在绝对坐标，并返回<xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>使用相对坐标的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>以绝对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>以相对坐标表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that can be used for drawing purposes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的 GDI + <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>可以用于进行绘制的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于执行可使用 GDI + 执行任何自定义绘制。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘图的对象。
